title: System Maintenance Tonight
message: Scheduled maintenance will occur tonight from 11:00 PM to 1:00 AM EST. Some services may be temporarily unavailable.
author: IT Operations

title: New Employee Onboarding Session
message: Welcome session for new team members scheduled for Friday at 2:00 PM in Conference Room A. All team leads please attend.
author: HR Department

title: Security Policy Update
message: Updated security policies are now in effect. Please review the new guidelines in the employee handbook and complete the mandatory training by end of week.
author: Security Team

title: Team Building Event
message: Join us for our quarterly team building event next Friday! Food, games, and prizes. RSVP in the employee portal by Wednesday.
author: People Operations

title: Quarterly All-Hands Meeting
message: Q3 results and Q4 planning session scheduled for Thursday at 10:00 AM. Meeting link will be sent via email.
author: Executive Team
